sentences.en: Fortune reigns in gifts of the would , not in lineament of Nature.
sentences.cn: 命运之神是人世间恩惠的主宰, 不能支配自然的相貌.

sentences.en: She has a beautiful lineament and golden hair which is gently floating on her back.
sentences.cn: 她有着锦绣的轮廓,她的头发是金黄色的,轻轻地飘荡在她的后背中心.

sentences.en: The lineament of the criminal has been found.
sentences.cn: 罪犯的特征已经找到了.

sentences.en: The young girl had regular and delicate lineament.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻姑娘的容貌长得端正而且秀丽.
